p: When age of respondents was analyzed, it is found that respondents aged 29 to 38 years to the highest extent respect movement restrictions, have food supplies for a month or more, and avoid contact with the elderly. Respondents aged 39 to 48, on the other hand, most commonly avoid hugging, and kissing with family members, friends and acquaintances, then carry out disinfection, and avoid contacts in general. Additionally, respondents aged 49 to 58 to the highest degree, avoid shaking hands, they maintain recommended distance, disinfect their petsâ€™ paws and make dietary plans ( Table 7).
